text:
care 
Admit to designated COVID-19 section of the 
maternity unit at the appropriate level of care 
COVID-19 rapid antigen test negative Do COVID-19 PCR test. Admit to PUI cubicle of 
maternity unit until PCR result available 
Admit and manage as COVID-19 negative 
patient. Daily screening for COVID-19 symptoms 
COVID-19 symptoms in pregnant and postpartum women 
• There is currently no known difference between the clinical manifestations of COVID -19 in pregnant and non- 
pregnant women.
• Mos
